name: Shooting Colors
description:
Fun shooting game based on "colors switching" and accuracy.

Mechanics:

  • You need to shoot an enemy with a weapon that is exactly the same color.
  • When you reload, you will a small Quick Time Event to achieve. If you do it well / at the right timing, the reload time will be very short.
  • If an enemy comes too close to you, it is game over.

Controls:

  • Keyboard ( [Arrows] to rotate, [Space] to shoot, [C] to reload, [V] to nuke, [W] to switch to previous weapon, [X] to switch to next weapon)
  • Gamepad ([Joystick] to move, [A] to shoot, [X] to reload, [B] to nuke, [Left Trigger] to switch to previous weapon, [Right Trigger] to switch to next weapon)

Made by one person (myself :)).
